EmailTemplate.description: Email to Provider for Case Creation acknowledgement for On_boarding form request
EmailTemplate.name: BCBS New Mexico Provider On_Boarding
EmailTemplate.subject: BCBS of New Mexico Provider On-boarding Request Form Received
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Case.Name_Submitter__c},
Thank you for contacting Blue Cross and Blue Shield of New Mexico.
This email is confirmation we have received your request, case number {!Case.CaseNumber}, for {!Case.Name_of_Provider_Group__c}.
Your request may take up to 30 days to complete. Once completed, a notification will be sent to the email address you provided during your submission.
To check the status of your case, please click on status checker({!$Setup.UtilitySettings_Hierarchy__c.CaseStatusUrl__c}) or for any questions contact 1-800-567-8540 or contact your Network Representative.
Sincerely, Blue Cross and Blue Shield of New Mexico
